name: Heat Metal
targets: metal equipment of one creature per two levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart, or 25 lbs. of metal/level, all of which must be within a 30-ft. circle
description: Heat metal causes metal objects to become red-hot. Unattended, nonmagical metal gets no saving throw. Magical metal is allowed a saving throw against the spell. An item in a creature's possession uses the creature's saving throw bonus unless its own is higher.
